svrSysMibMajorRev.name: svrSysMibMajorRev
svrSysMibMajorRev.description: The Major Revision of this implementation of the svrSystem MIB. Will be 1.

svrSysMibMinorRev.name: svrSysMibMinorRev
svrSysMibMinorRev.description: The minor rev of this implementation of the svrSystem MIB. Will be 0.

svrSystemFamily.name: svrSystemFamily
svrSystemFamily.description: Major system family; i.e. Alpha or Intel or Other.

svrSystemModel.name: svrSystemModel
svrSystemModel.description: Qualify SystemFamily with model, e.g. AlphaServer 2100

svrSystemDescr.name: svrSystemDescr
svrSystemDescr.description: For consistency with previous versions of MIB, very general text description of system type. Starts with Digital (Intel or Alpha) Server... plus any other descriptive text.

svrSystemBoardFruIndex.name: svrSystemBoardFruIndex
svrSystemBoardFruIndex.description: The index of the Field Replaceable Unit (FRU) in the FRU table describing the serial # and other asset info of this board. 0 if unknown.

svrSystemOCPDisplay.name: svrSystemOCPDisplay
svrSystemOCPDisplay.description: The content of the operator control panel (OCP). Null if unknown. Writeable on some systems.

svrSystemBootedOSVersion.name: svrSystemBootedOSVersion
svrSystemBootedOSVersion.description: Version of the OS that's booted on the system.

svrSystemShutdownReason.name: svrSystemShutdownReason
svrSystemShutdownReason.description: The possible reason for the system shutdown.

svrSystemRemoteMgrNum.name: svrSystemRemoteMgrNum
svrSystemRemoteMgrNum.description: A phone number entry for a remote manager.

svrFirmwareTable.name: svrFirmwareTable
svrFirmwareTable.description: Table of information about the firmware, or firmwares, that may be present on this system. It may include SRM & ARC console firmware, optionally Fail Safe Loader. On Intel-family systems, will describe the System BIOS. May also include second levels, such as PALcode and BIOS emulator versions, if they are accessible to the software.

svrFirmwareEntry.name: svrFirmwareEntry
svrFirmwareEntry.description: Each entry represents a single instance of firmware in the system.

svrFirmwareDescr.name: svrFirmwareDescr
svrFirmwareDescr.description: e.g. SRM console, ARC console, System BIOS, etc.

svrFirmwareRev.name: svrFirmwareRev
svrFirmwareRev.description: A version number possibly of the form Vx.y or Vx.y-z.

svrFwSymbolTable.name: svrFwSymbolTable
svrFwSymbolTable.description: Table of soft switches and symbols maintained by the firmware. May be operating system and/or option-specific and will certainly be system-specific. This list is intended to be easily extensible and support arbitrary datatypes. It includes such switches as powerup options, default dump device, etc. Note - the string comparision for svrFwSymbolName is case insensitive.

svrFwSymbolEntry.name: svrFwSymbolEntry
svrFwSymbolEntry.description: Each entry represents one variable or symbol maintained by or stored by some instance of firmware in the system.

svrFwSymbolName.name: svrFwSymbolName
svrFwSymbolName.description: The symbol name as visible at the console.

svrFwSymbolValue.name: svrFwSymbolValue
svrFwSymbolValue.description: The symbol value. Null if none or unknown.

svrCpuPollInterval.name: svrCpuPollInterval
svrCpuPollInterval.description: In seconds, interval between polls for utilization. Values less than svrCpuMinPollInterval are erroneous except for 0, which disables polling.

svrCpuMinPollInterval.name: svrCpuMinPollInterval
svrCpuMinPollInterval.description: In seconds, minimum allowable time between polls for this implementation. Must be greater than 0.

svrCpuTable.name: svrCpuTable
svrCpuTable.description: Table of central processors on this system and their base configuration data. This is an extension to the hrDeviceTable of the Host Resources MIB; RFC1514. The cache and utilization data are conceptual dimensions added to this table.

svrCpuEntry.name: svrCpuEntry
svrCpuEntry.description: Each entry represents one distinct processor in the system.

svrCpuIndex.name: svrCpuIndex
svrCpuIndex.description: Locally-unique index value for this CPU entry.

svrCpuFruIndex.name: svrCpuFruIndex
svrCpuFruIndex.description: The index of the FRU entry in the FRU table describing the asset info of the component containing this processor. 0 if unknown.

svrCpuUtilCurrent.name: svrCpuUtilCurrent
svrCpuUtilCurrent.description: Percentage of cpu utilization over the last svrCpuPollInterval.

svrCpuAvgNextIndex.name: svrCpuAvgNextIndex
svrCpuAvgNextIndex.description: Next available index for creating a cpu utilization averaging interval.

svrCpuHrIndex.name: svrCpuHrIndex
svrCpuHrIndex.description: Reference to index of hrDeviceEntry for this cpu in Host Resources MIB. 0 if unknown.

svrCpuAvgTable.name: svrCpuAvgTable
svrCpuAvgTable.description: Extension to svrCpuTable, this table contains utilization averages maintained over a set of manager-settable intervals.

svrCpuAvgEntry.name: svrCpuAvgEntry
svrCpuAvgEntry.description: Entry describes a CPU, an interval over which CPU utilization is averaged, and average utilization measured at the last interval

svrCpuAvgIndex.name: svrCpuAvgIndex
svrCpuAvgIndex.description: Local index. May have implementation max.

svrCpuAvgInterval.name: svrCpuAvgInterval
svrCpuAvgInterval.description: In minutes, averaging interval for this entry.

svrCpuAvgStatus.name: svrCpuAvgStatus
svrCpuAvgStatus.description: This variable describes the status of the row. When the row is created with the initial set, svrCpuAvgStatus must be set to underCreation. When the management console has completed row setup, it should set this variable to rowEnabled. Variables in the row may only be written if svrCpuAvgStatus is in the initial underCreation state or has been set to rowDisabled. To delete the row, set the status to rowInvalid. It is a local implementation matter whether the row is actually removed from the table. Management applications must be prepared to ignore rows with a status of rowInvalid. Errors in cpu utilization polling and averaging that are determined by local implementation to be non-correctable will cause a row status change to rowError.

svrCpuAvgPersist.name: svrCpuAvgPersist
svrCpuAvgPersist.description: True if this row is to persist across agent restarts.

svrCpuAvgValue.name: svrCpuAvgValue
svrCpuAvgValue.description: Averaged load over the last measured interval. First set to instantaneous utilization.

svrCpuCacheTable.name: svrCpuCacheTable
svrCpuCacheTable.description: Extension of svrCpuTable describing the caches used by each of the system processors.

svrCpuCacheEntry.name: svrCpuCacheEntry
svrCpuCacheEntry.description: An entry describes a single cache for a single cpu.

svrCpuCacheLevel.name: svrCpuCacheLevel
svrCpuCacheLevel.description: Level 1 or Level 2 or Level 3 cache. Or other or unknown.

svrCpuCacheType.name: svrCpuCacheType
svrCpuCacheType.description: Type of cache - Internal, external, internal instruction or internal data.

svrCpuCacheSpeed.name: svrCpuCacheSpeed
svrCpuCacheSpeed.description: In nanoseconds, cache speed. 0 if unknown.

svrCpuCacheStatus.name: svrCpuCacheStatus
svrCpuCacheStatus.description: Current status of the cache - enabled, disabled, other or unknown.

svrPhysicalMemorySize.name: svrPhysicalMemorySize
svrPhysicalMemorySize.description: In KBytes, total amount of physical memory as seen by the OS.

svrPhysicalMemoryFree.name: svrPhysicalMemoryFree
svrPhysicalMemoryFree.description: In KBytes, amount of free physical memory.

svrPagingMemorySize.name: svrPagingMemorySize
svrPagingMemorySize.description: In KBytes, total virtual memory available from the OS.

svrMemComponentTable.name: svrMemComponentTable
svrMemComponentTable.description: Table describing hardware configuration of memory

svrMemComponentEntry.name: svrMemComponentEntry
svrMemComponentEntry.description: Entries describe physical memory hardware component.

svrMemType.name: svrMemType
svrMemType.description: Type of memory may be system, shadow, bios, video, ....

svrMemSize.name: svrMemSize
svrMemSize.description: In KBytes, length of memory range

svrMemStartAddress.name: svrMemStartAddress
svrMemStartAddress.description: 64-bit starting address of memory contained on or controlled by this component.

svrMemEdcType.name: svrMemEdcType
svrMemEdcType.description: Type of error detection & correction(EDC) provided for memory contained on or controlled by this component.

svrMemElementSlots.name: svrMemElementSlots
svrMemElementSlots.description: Total number of slots for removeable memory elements (simms, dimms, etc). 0 if unknown.

svrMemElementSlotsUsed.name: svrMemElementSlotsUsed
svrMemElementSlotsUsed.description: Total number of slots occupied by removable memory elements. 0 if unknown.

svrMemInterleafFactor.name: svrMemInterleafFactor
svrMemInterleafFactor.description: Interleaving factor. 0 if unknown, 1 if none, 2 if 2-way, etc...

svrMemInterleafElement.name: svrMemInterleafElement
svrMemInterleafElement.description: Which element this is in interleaving. 0 if non-interleaved.

svrMemFruIndex.name: svrMemFruIndex
svrMemFruIndex.description: Index of the FRU entry in the FRU table on which this memory resides, if known. 0 if unknown.

svrMemElementTable.name: svrMemElementTable
svrMemElementTable.description: An extension to the svrMemComponentTable, this table describes the actual memory hardware elements. If the memory component does not lend itself to decomposition by element, there may be a generic element entry listed to hold the attributes.

svrMemElementEntry.name: svrMemElementEntry
svrMemElementEntry.description: A chunk of memory which may be non-removable, a SIMM, a DIMM or some undefined piece.

svrMemElementSlotNo.name: svrMemElementSlotNo
svrMemElementSlotNo.description: If removeable, the slot number in which it resides. 0 if unknown.

svrMemElementWidth.name: svrMemElementWidth
svrMemElementWidth.description: In bytes, width if known. 0 if unknown.

svrMemElementDepth.name: svrMemElementDepth
svrMemElementDepth.description: In KBytes, depth if known. 0 if unknown.

svrMemElementSpeed.name: svrMemElementSpeed
svrMemElementSpeed.description: In nanoseconds, speed as used. May be less than maximum possible speed. 0 if unknown.

svrBusCount.name: svrBusCount
svrBusCount.description: Number of buses seen by the system.

svrBusTable.name: svrBusTable
svrBusTable.description: Each entry represents a bus as seen by the OS.

svrBusNumber.name: svrBusNumber
svrBusNumber.description: The bus number, unique among buses of this type

svrBusSlotCount.name: svrBusSlotCount
svrBusSlotCount.description: Number of physical slots on this bus. 0 if unknown.

svrLogicalSlotTable.name: svrLogicalSlotTable
svrLogicalSlotTable.description: Table on logical bus slots. Indexed by busIndex & slot number. May be more logical slots than physical slots.

svrLogicalSlotEntry.name: svrLogicalSlotEntry
svrLogicalSlotEntry.description: Represents a slot as seen by OS. May not have associated physical slot.

svrLogicalSlotNumber.name: svrLogicalSlotNumber
svrLogicalSlotNumber.description: Unique logical slot number on a given bus.

svrLogicalSlotDescr.name: svrLogicalSlotDescr
svrLogicalSlotDescr.description: Device description derived from ID, or as set by mgt station.

svrLogicalSlotVendor.name: svrLogicalSlotVendor
svrLogicalSlotVendor.description: Name of manufacturer derived from vendor ID, the vendor ID itself or null if unknown.

svrLogicalSlotRevision.name: svrLogicalSlotRevision
svrLogicalSlotRevision.description: Vendor supplied major and minor revision of device in this slot.

svrLogicalSlotFnCount.name: svrLogicalSlotFnCount
svrLogicalSlotFnCount.description: Number of functions for multi-function device. Usually 1 for PCI devices.

svrSlotFunctionTable.name: svrSlotFunctionTable
svrSlotFunctionTable.description: An extension to the logical slot table, describes the functions on the device. Often, there will be only 1.

svrSlotFunctionEntry.name: svrSlotFunctionEntry
svrSlotFunctionEntry.description: Each entry describes a device function at this logical slot.

svrSlotFnDevType.name: svrSlotFnDevType
svrSlotFnDevType.description: Device type represented by this function. May be derived by table lookup of device id.

svrKeybdHrIndex.name: svrKeybdHrIndex
svrKeybdHrIndex.description: Index of the hrDeviceEntry in Host Resources MIB. 0 if unknown.

svrVideoHrIndex.name: svrVideoHrIndex
svrVideoHrIndex.description: Index in Host Devices table. 0 if unknown.

svrVideoNumColor.name: svrVideoNumColor
svrVideoNumColor.description: Number of colors (converted, if necessary, from bits-per-pixel).

svrVideoRefreshRate.name: svrVideoRefreshRate
svrVideoRefreshRate.description: In Hz, current refresh rate. 0 if unavailable, 1 if hardware default rate.

svrVideoScanMode.name: svrVideoScanMode
svrVideoScanMode.description: Whether or not this is interlaced, if we know.

svrVideoMemory.name: svrVideoMemory
svrVideoMemory.description: Amount of video memory available or in use, in KBytes.

svrPointingHrIndex.name: svrPointingHrIndex
svrPointingHrIndex.description: Index in host devices table. 0 if unknown.

svrNumButtons.name: svrNumButtons
svrNumButtons.description: Number of buttons on this mouse.

svrSerialPortEntry.name: svrSerialPortEntry
svrSerialPortEntry.description: Each entry describes a serial port in this system.

svrSerialHrIndex.name: svrSerialHrIndex
svrSerialHrIndex.description: The hrDeviceIndex value from the hrDeviceEntry in the Host Resources MIB describing this port. 0 if unknown.

svrParallelPortEntry.name: svrParallelPortEntry
svrParallelPortEntry.description: Each entry describes a parallel port in this system.

svrParallelPortDescr.name: svrParallelPortDescr
svrParallelPortDescr.description: Text description of port device as seen by OS.

svrParallelHrIndex.name: svrParallelHrIndex
svrParallelHrIndex.description: Reference to index of hrDeviceEntry for this port in Host Resources MIB. 0 if unknown.

svrDeviceTable.name: svrDeviceTable
svrDeviceTable.description: Device configuration or adapter device as seen by the Host OS.

svrDeviceEntry.name: svrDeviceEntry
svrDeviceEntry.description: Each entry represents one resource as seen by the Host OS.

svrDevIndex.name: svrDevIndex
svrDevIndex.description: Local unique integer value for this entry

svrDevDescr.name: svrDevDescr
svrDevDescr.description: String description of the device as seen by the OS.

svrDevBusInterfaceType.name: svrDevBusInterfaceType
svrDevBusInterfaceType.description: Type of bus for this interface.

svrDevBusNumber.name: svrDevBusNumber
svrDevBusNumber.description: The index of bus on which this device resides (0=internal)

svrDevSlotNumber.name: svrDevSlotNumber
svrDevSlotNumber.description: The logical slot number where this device resides. 0 if unknown.

svrDevFruIndex.name: svrDevFruIndex
svrDevFruIndex.description: The index of the FRU entry in the FRU table that contains this device. 0 if unknown.

svrDevCPUAffinity.name: svrDevCPUAffinity
svrDevCPUAffinity.description: Bit map describing processors to which interrupts are dispatched. Use first IRQL entry if they are different. Bit position = cpu # starting from Least Significant Bit (LSB).

svrDevHrIndex.name: svrDevHrIndex
svrDevHrIndex.description: Index of the device in the Host Resources MIB device table. 0 if unknown.

svrDevInterruptTable.name: svrDevInterruptTable
svrDevInterruptTable.description: Table of interrupt configurations for this device. Extension to svrDeviceTable.

svrDevIntEntry.name: svrDevIntEntry
svrDevIntEntry.description: Each entry describes one interrupt for the device.

svrDevIntLevel.name: svrDevIntLevel
svrDevIntLevel.description: OS interrupt-level for which this device is configured. IRQL in Windows NT.

svrDevMemTable.name: svrDevMemTable
svrDevMemTable.description: Table of memory configuration used by this adapter device. Extension to svrDeviceTable.

svrDevMemEntry.name: svrDevMemEntry
svrDevMemEntry.description: A single memory address configuration for this device.

svrDevMemAddress.name: svrDevMemAddress
svrDevMemAddress.description: Physical address of the start of the memory range.

svrDevMemLength.name: svrDevMemLength
svrDevMemLength.description: In bytes, size of the memory range.

svrDevMemMapping.name: svrDevMemMapping
svrDevMemMapping.description: Whether this is memory mapped or I/O mapped address space.

svrDevDmaTable.name: svrDevDmaTable
svrDevDmaTable.description: Table of DMA configurations for this device.

svrDevDmaEntry.name: svrDevDmaEntry
svrDevDmaEntry.description: Each entry describes use of a DMA channel.

svrChassisType.name: svrChassisType
svrChassisType.description: A description of the type of box in which this system resides.

svrChassisFruIndex.name: svrChassisFruIndex
svrChassisFruIndex.description: The index of the chassis FRU descriptor in the FRU table. 0 if unknown.

svrFruTable.name: svrFruTable
svrFruTable.description: Table of Field Replaceable Units of system, providing inventory and asset control information. This table is referenced from logical hardware descriptions elsewhere in the MIB.

svrFruEntry.name: svrFruEntry
svrFruEntry.description: Each entry represents a Field Replaceable Unit (FRU) of hardware.

svrFruType.name: svrFruType
svrFruType.description: General category of the type of FRU that this is.

svrFruDescr.name: svrFruDescr
svrFruDescr.description: More detailed description of FRU type, if known.

svrFruPartNumber.name: svrFruPartNumber
svrFruPartNumber.description: Number by which this unit is orderable.

svrFruRevision.name: svrFruRevision
svrFruRevision.description: Version number of this unit. If artwork level is available, it will appear as 'Artwork: XXX' following FRU version portion.

svrFruFirmwareRevision.name: svrFruFirmwareRevision
svrFruFirmwareRevision.description: The revision of the firmware, if any. Otherwise null.

svrFruSerialNumber.name: svrFruSerialNumber
svrFruSerialNumber.description: The serial number of this unit's instance.

svrFruClass.name: svrFruClass
svrFruClass.description: Represents the status category of the unit.

svrThermalSensorCount.name: svrThermalSensorCount
svrThermalSensorCount.description: The number of thermal sensors present and readable in this system.

svrThermalSensorTable.name: svrThermalSensorTable
svrThermalSensorTable.description: Table of thermal sensors in the system. May be gauges or status indicators. Not present if svrThermalSensorCount = 0.

svrThermalSensorEntry.name: svrThermalSensorEntry
svrThermalSensorEntry.description: A single temperature gauge or status indicator.

svrThSensorLocation.name: svrThSensorLocation
svrThSensorLocation.description: May be system box, main CPU, etc. Null if unknown.

svrThSensorReading.name: svrThSensorReading
svrThSensorReading.description: The current value read by the sensor, in units described by svrThSensorReadingUnits.

svrThSensorReadingUnits.name: svrThSensorReadingUnits
svrThSensorReadingUnits.description: Whether this sensor reads degrees Fahrenheit, Celsius, or relative value. If no reading is available, value will be unknown.

svrThSensorLowThresh.name: svrThSensorLowThresh
svrThSensorLowThresh.description: Default value for low temperature threshold. Units are as described in svrThSensorThreshUnits.

svrThSensorHighThresh.name: svrThSensorHighThresh
svrThSensorHighThresh.description: Default value for high temperature threshold. Units are as described in svrThSensorThreshUnits.

svrThSensorShutSoonThresh.name: svrThSensorShutSoonThresh
svrThSensorShutSoonThresh.description: Default value for Shutdown Soon temperature threshold. Units are as described in svrThSensorThreshUnits.

svrThSensorShutNowThresh.name: svrThSensorShutNowThresh
svrThSensorShutNowThresh.description: Default value for Shutdown Now temperature threshold. Units are as described in svrThSensorThreshUnits.

svrThSensorThreshUnits.name: svrThSensorThreshUnits
svrThSensorThreshUnits.description: Represents how all the threshold values should be interpreted. If default thresholds not supported, value will be unknown.

svrThSensorFruIndex.name: svrThSensorFruIndex
svrThSensorFruIndex.description: Index to the FRU entry in the FRU table on which this sensor resides, if known. 0 if unknown.

svrFanCount.name: svrFanCount
svrFanCount.description: Number of fans whose state is detectable.

svrFanTable.name: svrFanTable
svrFanTable.description: Table of fans in system. Not present if svrFanCount = 0.

svrFanLocation.name: svrFanLocation
svrFanLocation.description: Location of the fan. Null if unknown.

svrFanBackup.name: svrFanBackup
svrFanBackup.description: The index of the fan for which this is backup. 0 if unknown or n/a.

svrFanFruIndex.name: svrFanFruIndex
svrFanFruIndex.description: The index of the FRU entry in the FRU table containing this fan, if known. 0 if unknown.

svrPowerRedunEnable.name: svrPowerRedunEnable
svrPowerRedunEnable.description: Is redunancy enabled in this power supply subsystem?

svrPowerSensorCount.name: svrPowerSensorCount
svrPowerSensorCount.description: The number of detectable voltage sensors represented in svrVoltageSensorTable.

svrPowerSupplyCount.name: svrPowerSupplyCount
svrPowerSupplyCount.description: The number of detectable power supplies reflected as entries in the svrPowerSupplyTable.

svrPowerSensorTable.name: svrPowerSensorTable
svrPowerSensorTable.description: Table of power supplies - voltage or current. Not present if svrPowerSensorCount = 0.

svrPowerSensorEntry.name: svrPowerSensorEntry
svrPowerSensorEntry.description: One entry per detectable voltage or current sensor.

svrPowerSensorLocation.name: svrPowerSensorLocation
svrPowerSensorLocation.description: Description of physical location in system if known. Null if unknown.

svrPowerSensorRating.name: svrPowerSensorRating
svrPowerSensorRating.description: Nominal rating for this sensor, in units expressed by svrPowerSensorReadingUnits. If not supported, value will be unknown.

svrPowerSensorReading.name: svrPowerSensorReading
svrPowerSensorReading.description: Current state of voltage or current as detected by this sensor in units described by svrPowerSensorReadingUnits.

svrPowerSensorReadingUnits.name: svrPowerSensorReadingUnits
svrPowerSensorReadingUnits.description: Volts AC, DC, amperes AC, DC, ... If not supported, value will be unknown.

svrPowerSensorNeedPwrThresh.name: svrPowerSensorNeedPwrThresh
svrPowerSensorNeedPwrThresh.description: Default value for Need More Power voltage threshold. Units are as described in svrPowerSensorThreshUnits.

svrPowerSensorLowThresh.name: svrPowerSensorLowThresh
svrPowerSensorLowThresh.description: Default value for low voltage threshold. Units are as described in svrPowerSensorThreshUnits.

svrPowerSensorHighThresh.name: svrPowerSensorHighThresh
svrPowerSensorHighThresh.description: Default value for high voltage threshold. Units are as described in svrPowerSensorThreshUnits.

svrPowerSensorShutNowThresh.name: svrPowerSensorShutNowThresh
svrPowerSensorShutNowThresh.description: Default value for Shutdown Now voltage threshold. Units are as described in svrPowerSensorThreshUnits.

svrPowerSensorThreshUnits.name: svrPowerSensorThreshUnits
svrPowerSensorThreshUnits.description: Represents how all the threshold values should be interpreted. If default thresholds not supported, value will be unknown.

svrPowerSensorFruIndex.name: svrPowerSensorFruIndex
svrPowerSensorFruIndex.description: The index of the FRU entry in the FRU table containing this sensor, if known. 0 if unknown.

svrPowerSupplyTable.name: svrPowerSupplyTable
svrPowerSupplyTable.description: Table of power supply information. Not present if svrPowerSupplyCount = 0.

svrPowerSupplyEntry.name: svrPowerSupplyEntry
svrPowerSupplyEntry.description: One entry per detectable power supply.

svrPowerSupplyStatus.name: svrPowerSupplyStatus
svrPowerSupplyStatus.description: Current state of the power supply.

svrPowerSupplyFruIndex.name: svrPowerSupplyFruIndex
svrPowerSupplyFruIndex.description: The index of the FRUentry in the FRU table containing this power supply, if known. 0 if unknown.
